title: La Pentola Magica
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Italian, Macrobiotic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A vegetarian restaurant with plenty of vegan and gluten free options. All food is prepared fresh every morning. Uses whole wheat cereals and many legumes. You can also buy tea and plant-based milks to take home. Not easily reachable without a car as it is a bit far away from city center.
